actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to help leverage private investment for transit oriented development near transit stations.
short_title: Transit Related Investment Improvement Act of 2012

summary.text: Transit Related Investment Improvement Act of 2012 - Amends the Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act (TIFIA) to make eligible for TIFIA funding any projects to improve or construct public infrastructure located within one-half mile of the station area of a fixed-guideway transit facility, including improvements to mobility and parking, rehabilitation or construction of streets, transit stations, structured parking, or walkways and bikeways.

titles.title: Transit Related Investment Improvement Act of 2012
To amend title 23, United States Code, to help leverage private investment for transit oriented development near transit stations.
